# Mapper template

File: `infrastructure/{entity-name}/sql-{entity-name}.mapper.ts`

```ts
import { Xxx, XxxProps } from "../../domain/{entity-name}/{entity-name}";

// PrismaXxx is the type generated by Prisma from schema.prisma
type PrismaXxx = {
  id: string;
  // snake_case fields from DB...
  created_at: Date;
};

export class SqlXxxMapper {
  public static toDomain(raw: PrismaXxx): Xxx {
    return Xxx.create({
      id: raw.id,
      // snake_case → camelCase mapping
      createdAt: raw.created_at,
    });
  }

  public static toPersistence(entity: Xxx): PrismaXxx {
    const props = entity.toJSON();
    return {
      id: props.id,
      // camelCase → snake_case mapping
      created_at: props.createdAt,
    };
  }
}
```
